name: App Sandwich
tag_list: app, mobile, ios, ipad, iphone, development, music, messaging
overview:
Here at App Sandwich, we build apps for all kinds of devices and platforms - iPhone, iPad, iPod, Mac, Windows, Android, and beyond.

We also design & develop our own mobile apps, including:

Muud.io - Muud.io is a music app for iPhone & iPod touch that can recommend playlists, based on a given mood.

Tell Muud.io what mood of music you’d like to hear, and our community of music-lovers will build a playlist for you, using the music in your library.

http://muud.io

EirText - EirText Pro is part of the award-winning suite of messaging applications, available for iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, & Mac.

EirText allows you to send free webtexts, or cheap bulk SMS, to your friends, family, & colleagues.

http://www.eirtext.com

offices.address2: Galway-Mayo Institute of Technology, Dublin Road
